title: Dominic Cummings – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Suella Braverman
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Dominic Cummings, the former Downing Street advisor, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content:
given Gvt docs, incl OFF-SEN, are routinely circulated by top no10 & CABOFF officials by gmail and whatsapp DAILY, the idea that sending a draft WMS via gmail = sacking/resignation offence is laughable. clearly fired by PM / Hunt
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
